website_summaries.verdict: In general, consumers welcomed the versatility of the Skechers Ultra Flex - First Take, along with the comfort it delivers. Other points valued by the buyers include the slip-on style, the lightweight nature of the shoe, and the shock attenuation of the midsole. Though many liked the breathable mesh upper, there were complaints that it irritated some users. But overall, the trainer was highly applauded for its comfort as a reliable walking shoe.
pros: A vast majority of the owners found the Skechers Ultra Flex - First Take to be very comfortable during extended periods of wear
The overall style and slip-on construction of the footwear delighted a lot of users
Many wearers claimed that the product was made of durable and quality materials
The lightweight nature of this model pleased numerous buyers
Multiple users marveled at the shoe’s versatility
it was great for both athleisure and casual wear
The footgear is flexible, as stated by several wearers
More than a few gym-goers appreciated the shock absorption offered by the sole unit as it helped alleviate foot pain
The breathability of the mesh upper satisfied some purchasers
cons: A handful of shoppers complained that the mesh material irritated their instep and the Achilles, causing blisters in some instances
The arch support on this footwear was deemed inadequate by a few people
Some individuals were dismayed that the sole unit quickly wore out

customer_reviews.title: In love with these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in heaven!! I have neuropathy in my feet and it's very difficult to find shoes that are comfortable. Thank you Sketchers! I just received these and tried them on and they feel like I'm walking on air!! Absolutely am in love with these and they look good too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Truthinadvertising

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, love the look. They are my favorite shoes to take with my when I travel and know I will be doing a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREME COMFORT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in LOVE with these shoes!! I'm 5'4" and a size 18 and work on my feet for 8 hours a day, these shoes saved my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H

customer_reviews.title: I walk alot and this is very comfy! Easy to put on while at the airport.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it is very comfortable. Being a mom while travelling can be exhausting. So I got this with its promise of comfort and ease. It really is comfy. While travelling and walking I can go all day while taking care of my baby. Easy to put on and take off while going through airport security.
customer_reviews.author: funkymonkey

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers loyal
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketchers shoes, it’s all I buy. This is my 7th pair. This is no exception, I love this shoe. It does run big and I was counting on that. It didn’t disappoint. The soft flexible upper is perfect for accommodating my bunion brace. Cute, comfortable, super light shoe. Thanks Sketchers!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved her new shoes when they arrived
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved her new shoes when they arrived. Size was a little bit off. She needed to wear a thick sock to fill-in the shoe. Nonetheless, she is very very happy with her Skechers!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sala

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. I went out and bought some arch supports, first, to put in these shoes. I mostly wear them to walk around the house while I'm cleaning. They are easy to slip on and off. They fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable. I was wearing slippers around the house and my feet and back hurt so bad because of it. These shoes help my feet not hurt so much. There are times when I can't even tell that I'm wearing any shoes at all. That's how comfortable they are! I don't wear socks around the house, so this review is for bare feet in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy H.

customer_reviews.title: 47 miles at Disney World!
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple foot and ankle problems due to injuries. I also have some neuropathy in my left foot. We just returned from a trip to DisneyWorld where I walked 47 miles in 7 days. These shoes are absolutely the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. They conform to my foot and allow for swelling at the end of the day. I have two pairs and would buy more if merchants carried them in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kay Newill

customer_reviews.title: LIght Weight and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are wonderful for your feet. They are light weight and absolutely comfortable. I usually wear a size 6.5 but opted to go to a size 7 since they hug your whole foot. Very happy I went a half size up, I can wear them with or without socks. Sneaker does not slide off either way. I wore them today for a 2 mile walk and my feet were not achy at all. Cushion is great. I will be ordering another color.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy ! Even to wear the first day I had no problems . I have wide feet and have a high arch , I take size 9 but ordered 9 1/2 for my wide foot . Just the regular size mind you not the wide . I loved them so much I let my mom try them who’s 91 and she also has wide feet and walks 3,000 steps per day ! She loves tried mom and loved the fit after walking in them so I ordered her a pair !! She’s still very happy with them , plus we ordered the black with the black sole . Very sharp looking versus the white sole .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is everything....
customer_reviews.text: So many foot problems, I wear insoles and heel cups and they fit without looking bulky.....these shoes are so darn comfortable, I couldn't go to work without them! Can wear with professional trousers or jeans. No pressure points, they hug my foot without any issues. I love Skechers, these are my most favorite ever...the styles always change, I'm ordering another pair as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Crewtondix

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, and still professional enough to wear to work.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work, where I have to wear professional type shoes. These barely cut it, being that they almost look like a tennis shoe. I get away with them because they don’t have laces ;) My issue with approved shoes for women in a professional setting (Mary Jane or flats) is that I can’t wear socks with them, so I get blisters on my heel. These are high enough around my ankle to wear socks with, and they are incredibly comfortable. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Renae Klope

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have many, many Skechers shoes and I have loved them all as they have come out but these, by far, are my favorite, most comfortable ones! I wish they made them in more colors, I already own 4 pair. I've had foot pain and knee pain and these shoes are the only ones that I can wear all day long without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: luvnewshoes

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I love Skechers for their comfortable feel. This shoe does feel comfortable. I ordered a size 6 which is my exact size in any shoe and the shoe fit me too tight. I returned them no problem and ordered a half size bigger... it fit me exactly. 6.5 normally gives me wiggle room so I think the shoe is not true to size. I’m going to try another half size bigger, a size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Ordonez

customer_reviews.title: Love the style.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about them accept I'm not totally sure if I got the right size. If I don't keep my toenails clipped short, my toes hurt after wearing them for a long period of time. They don't seem too big or too small. I think they are just new and shaping to my foot. For once I don't look like I have giant duck feet with this sleek style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a hard time finding shoes that are comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding shoes that are comfortable and fit well. These met both needs and are super comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Suzmills

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible shoes!!! I have diabetes, fibromyalgia and RA (I know I'm a lucky gal). I bought a pair and they are literally my favorite shoe. They fit perfect I'm a 8.5, the arch is just right. I was so afraid I would wear mine out but I haven't that I bought a extra pair just in case. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes for errands days
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair, I love how comfortable they are. I can spend all day running errands and feel great. They are really cute too. The colors are accurate, I own sage, taupe and navy, all are exactly what I expected. I wish I could find them in red.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light
customer_reviews.text: Super light shoes and I love the ease of no laces. They fit my narrow feet well, just are a tad loose. They also don't seem to have as much cushion as they should for memory foam. They seem to have some normal padding of maybe 1/3 inch but nothing I feel like memory foam. Little arch support as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UGLY!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I opened the box to find that I had not bought a replacement for my favorite Skechers. I call these my Covid Clodhoppers. They aren't a bad fit but I would not have given them a second look in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Mme CJS

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose your money on an unwearable shoe like me: (
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 shoe so naturally, I purchased the shoe in a 10. Way too big. I then bought it in a size 9.5. Still too big as it was sliding off the back of my heel. I then ordered the 9. At first I thought the shoe was okay even though the stretchy material was snug on my left foot. However, once I wore the shoe for a whole day, it rubbed my foot raw. I don’t think I can send the shoe back since I’ve worn them. Don't lose your money on an unwearable shoe like me :(
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Loved this but unfortunately it was not wide enough. I had to return. If you have had foot surgery I don't recommend in your normal size. I would suggest a full size bigger than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Meh2

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers always comfy
customer_reviews.text: As usual these sketchers are awesome, walking on a cloud, light weight, I’m a size 7 and that is what I ordered and they fit perfectly!! Will be buying in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Queen b

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair...no end in sight
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I am on my feet at school for 6hrs and these slip on and off so easily and are extremely comfortable. I actually ordered another pair so I wouldn’t wear out my school pair and then I could wear them everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: alayna anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for imperfect feet.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 68 year old woman with very crooked feet. I have had two bunion surgeries and two feet muscle extractions and a calcified cysts removed from Gout. All shoes hurt but these. I would love to have them in every color. But since they are unavailable in my size I wear lined Crocs at home.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker for work
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I bought it to wear to work since I’m on my feet constantly . I love the no laces that’s why I purchased them. Sometime I feel the material is too thin and transparent like the water can get in easily or something sharp can get in from the top of shoe. I needed just a little more arch support as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mya T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes that I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove !
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes ! I loved that They have option for all black . They are most comfortable and hug the foot . So even if you have a wider set foot or skinny they will fit like a glove. However a little pricey .
customer_reviews.author: amy stewart

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COMFY, BEST SHOES EVER !!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST SHOES EVER , so comfy, I wouldn't buy anything but skeckers now as a nurse on my feet all the time , like walking on clouds......
customer_reviews.author: cori l watkins

customer_reviews.title: These Shoes Have Changed My Life!
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions and corns and have always had trouble finding comfortable walking shoes. But these are absolutely amazing! I can wear them all day, walk up and down stairs, jog, hike--you name it-- with no problems. Not only that, but they look great with trousers, so I can also wear them to work. Absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Iago

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable thing I have ever put on my feet. I love them. The insole is nicely cushioned. The sneaker just gently hugs your foot. They also look really nice, not super sneakery. They are wonderful and such a great value. Friends and family are laughing at me because I’ve been raving about them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, My go to slip ons
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off yet stay on your feet without slipping around when you walk. Neutral color makes it easy to throw these on for a drive to the store or a very long walk. My doctor and his nurse both complimented them too!! Hey, aren't you supposed to be checking me out?? LOL
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Won't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I can walk for a long time without any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl DiLisio

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. I work 12h shifts and have bone spurs on my heel. The back of the shoe is like getting a massage when I walk. Love love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit true to size. Very comfortable and sock like top to them. I wouldn’t recommend for people who stand for 8+ hours a day unless you put some pads in them. I do enjoy them for walks and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I purchased a pair of black ones at a Sketchers outlet & liked them so much I wanted another pair in a different color. I purchased the Navy pair here and am very happy with them. Both of my feet have been broken in the past and I have pain when wearing some shoes. These stretch all over so they are super comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes - My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! It took me forever to finally buckle down and pick a replacement of my forever favorite that was discontinued by sketchers. These are a wonderfully perfect replacement. Slip on easy without having to reach down, light on the feet, good support, and not too tight or loose. Very happy. Ohh and shipped super fast
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy downs

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a torn plantar's plate and rarely find any shoe or sneaker that is comfortable. Sketchers are the best...and this model is just a little bit dressier than the others. As a matter of fact, I have a pair in black that I wear all the time, so I bought another pair in black to have in reserve.
customer_reviews.author: Phylis S. Shulman

customer_reviews.title: Soft walk
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a lovely senior, who claimed they were comfortable, and very easy to wear. No laces a plus, the upper construction nice and soft. 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Wannabee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about these..
customer_reviews.text: There’s hardly any arch support. I’m actually shocked at how many great reviews there are for these shoes.. the soles feel like there is more cushion in some parts of the soles but not in the spots that would need them like the arch and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my comfy stretchy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the first that I've ever found that truly fit my swollen feet and ankles! Comfortable, easy to put on and take off, nice looking. I would buy these by the trunkful! ❤️ Would love to see wider widths, more colors, and more grip on the treads.
customer_reviews.author: Haniver6

customer_reviews.title: Confort
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my better half and it’s the first shoe she buys and puts them on and doesn’t want to take them off! Comfortable, supple and conforms to her feet! Now she wants other colors too... see what you have done? Yikes
customer_reviews.author: Mario3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Easy to slip on. Light weight. Most of the time I prefer to go barefoot, I got a pair to wear around the house. I find them being my go-to every day shoes. Provides support and comfort all in one. I'm ordering a second pair of all black, when they are back in-stock.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom. She says they are great & comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love this cute shoe boot.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable. Heel inside extra cushion,easy on and off, stretch for a cozy fit. Might buy a second pair for if/when there wear out. Best sketchers I ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was comfortable from the moment I put it on. The product is very well made. But, the shoe does run large. You should order 1/2 down. I was not able to get a half size smaller do I just had to return the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nanolady

customer_reviews.title: Too wide and big
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 11 in shoes usually and i bought size 11 but these were much bigger and wider than expected. Size 10 would be better. But the memory foam was not thick enough and I usually stand on my feet all day long.
customer_reviews.author: L R

customer_reviews.title: No arch support for long term use.
customer_reviews.text: I work at Amazon and I'm on my feet for 10 plus hours. They hurt the top part of my feet and my arches. They are find for everyday use but not for more than 3 hours. I would return them but now they're a little dusty from work.....
customer_reviews.author: Lhow

customer_reviews.title: Wow Factor
customer_reviews.text: This shoe makes you feel like you are walking on air. The fit across the instep and around the ankle is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CCT

customer_reviews.title: Lacks arch support
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. They have too much elasticity. So my foot slides around too much. I find this to be very uncomfortable. I also didn't find these to have adequate arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wide foot this shield is not for you. Also I dont find them bigger then expected. I ordered a 5 1/2 and I wear a between a 5 1/2 and 6 wide so these are tight. Also my foot slips out if the back when i walk. Hoping they stretch out a bit in the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes are very comfortable [not for someone who might have a job involving 12 hour shifts and hours of standing or walking] and the design makes it go with several casual outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Exact Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Solution shoe !
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find this shoe! Have an old foot injury that limits the type of shoe that will fit. The knot top stretches perfectly to provide comfort and looks nice. I ordered a second pair immediately! Love this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Prime Lover

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m diabetic with sensitive feet. These shoes feel like slippers! So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kathie lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Am in love with these shoes!! Super comfortable, the fit is perfect, is almost like am wearing socks, I love the color and so far I have been wearing them every chance I have, the quality is really good too which is something that I like about the brand, I want to get the pink color so I will have to wait until is available!
customer_reviews.author: olgaT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit. For those concerned about the sole, I have attached a picture...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and extremely comfortable. These sneakers are a true size fit. Even though they come up high on the floor, the material has enough flex to pull on easily.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes. They slip on so easily and are so comfortable! I wear a lot of teal shirts so these are perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Has a little space. Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 7, that’s my size and it has some space. Wore it barefoot and it could come out easily. It didn’t fall off so that was good. Will prob fit better with socks. Super comfortable thought. Like walking on air. Will update as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Nen

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these shoes. Unfortunately the right shoe is smaller in both pairs and the toe box is also smaller in the right shoe, same, both pairs. They are great if you don't mind putting moleskin on the right, inside both pairs because of a poorly unfinished seam. Oh, you will also have to wear a band-aide for the blister on the right heel, on the right side of the heal. Sketchers Ultra flex shoes.
customer_reviews.author: sandra k clifford

customer_reviews.title: Okay fit
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as what I thought. Would have liked more support. Also like little bit more of a heel with my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Nicole English

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a black pair and they were perfect. The Navy are a true navy but this pair was slightly shorter. Really sharp looking! Many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: no support
customer_reviews.text: fit like a bedroom slipper, no support, sloppy, ugly color. bought a pair of Sketcher running shoe, thin sole, no support. Will not purchase this brand again EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my mother. She loves them. Said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes - Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife and she loved them. I actually have not seen her take them off since. She says they are super comfortable and breathe really well. They look very nice also and in black (which is what we got) they go nicely with almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: My favorite go to shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I wear them everyday. I usually prefer to go barefoot. These provide more support and comfort without feeling restrictive. I even ended up buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. I have a hammertie and bunions and they aren't bothering when I wear these. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. G

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Comfortable.  I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Theirs nothing to dislike. The shoes are amazingly comfortable. Their stylish, lightweight and make your feet look smaller. I wear them to go shopping , walking or just styling.
customer_reviews.author: Rose P Grant

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These Sketchers are so comfortable I didn't want to take them off. I want to get the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Feels like walking on air. Wish I had ordered two pair while they were on sale! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Original design is better, should have left it as it was!
customer_reviews.text: The toe box was way to tight. I was disappointed as i only wear sketchers shoes and already own a pair of this style that fits great. These crushed my toes, not enough stretchy material was used to make the toe box. Skechers Ultra Flex first take is not as good as the Skechers Ultra Flex Harmonious
customer_reviews.author: Sharkie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these use them for work. This is my third pair and they are the best for people who walk a lot during their day.
customer_reviews.author: Ohlulu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear them all the time and they are washable. I would recommend these and will purchase again. I even use them for house shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Feel good working all day
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have bunions or problem feet! Also perfect if you work all day in them!
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet 8 hours a day...these shoes are totally comfortable...true to size...I definitely recommend...
customer_reviews.author: nitabk1

customer_reviews.title: Shoes from heaven
customer_reviews.text: Omg these shoes are the bomb. The best pair of shoes I have ever worn. Will buy other colors. You will not be disappointed if you buy these shoes. HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa West

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Skeechers. I get complements on this pair all the time. They are comfortable and durable. I am in the healthcare field and am constantly on my feet. These are great support as well as fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrell Santana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slip on
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to shoes for taking a quick walk to the mailbox or the store. They are so easy to slip on. I have had multiple foot surgeries, but these shoes are so comfortable because of their stretchy top. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: FLNewGirl

customer_reviews.title: They are a little loose, my regular size in ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a little loose, my regular size in same style is a little tight. Still real comfy to walk around, cute with dress/skirt. Socks will resolve.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Such comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I may just live in these! If I could afford it, I’d buy one in each color!! They are so comfortable. I have a lot of arthritis in my feet and have trouble finding shoes that are comfortable. These are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: grandma64

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my mom who had swelling in her feet. I wore them out to a quick trip to the store once and had to go buy myself a pair. They are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Angela H

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Got these today; put them on; worked in them all day. They’re like walking on clouds, but with good arch support. I just ordered two more pairs—that’s how awesome these are. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: LoftyLanaTruthTeller

customer_reviews.title: Sketcher ultra women flex
customer_reviews.text: I love this sneaker, it is easy to put on, comfortable for all day walking.
customer_reviews.author: JamQueen

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: 10.5 is usally good for me but I always by 11 for sock room . These were to small for me. I feel as though they runner smaller maybe. Just didn’t work for me. Width was perfect though.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Gibson

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe I have
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam is incredible - the stretch upper part of the shoe makes this a must have. I bought it in Navy and I'm going to get another color - I wear them every chance I get. Breathable and light as air. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: pooja

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: One shoe is defective. The heel is larger. Tried to wear them. Caused discomfort. Sitting in my closet and there they'll stay. Love Skechers. Not sure these ones are real.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for tired feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes.. so comfortable.. thank you to my husband for thinking of me when he saw them advertised on a commercial!
customer_reviews.author: Sleigh

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit a little larger than true but that i could deal with. I felt these shoes werent very comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: M and M

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought a pair during her pregnancy and they helped reduce her swollen ankles. I highly recommend it for all pregnant woman.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Galvez

customer_reviews.title: They're easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: I like how they slip on and how you can open them wider to get your foot into them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Love the fit , the look and the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daily shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Just right and oh so comfy! Soft and forgiving for anyone with foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: RNdoll

customer_reviews.title: Comfort plus!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very, very comfortable shoes. Plan on taking them to Europe where I will be walking a lot!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie frakes

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is nice looking and comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this shoe. I wear it for walking and it is sooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S Glenn

customer_reviews.title: They feel wonderful, fit great
customer_reviews.text: Received them then traveled out of town so haven't had a chance to wear them yet, only try them on. They feel wonderful, fit great, I can't wait to give them a proper wearing
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got the for my mom and she is in love with them. She says they're super comfy, almost like just having socks on. Love the color and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie J

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Skechers so much I ordered two more pair of similar shoes in other colors. Insoles are comfortable and outer shoes fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Buttchops

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable with easy on/off
customer_reviews.text: Love the color which goes with everything surprisingly. Comfortable. Neat and tidy with today’s workout type clothes. I’ve since bought the same shoe in Navy and will order other colors as they come available in my size. Does not make my feet hot (I live in Florida so that’s important)
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes, they are super comfortable and cute and I love wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: April415

customer_reviews.title: Feels so good 😊
customer_reviews.text: Feels very good on feet, so comfortable, especially helps if you have bone spurs or defects of feet that make wider
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Women's Ultra Flex-First Take Sneakers Are Sooo Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these Sketchers and absolutely love them! Soooo comfortable!!! Like walking on air!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's Ultra Flex-First Take Slip On Trainers
product_meta.description: These Ultra Flex - First Take sneakers feature skech knit mesh stretch fabric upper. Slip on sporty comfort walking and training sneakers with interwoven designs. Air cooled memory foam insole, highly flexible comfort midsole.
